title: Ahri charm tooltip error
body:
Charm's actual damage is buffed to 60/95/130/165/200 from 60/90/120/150/180 in Patch 5.2.

But the in-game tooltip is still 60/**90/120/150**/200.

replies.body:
Uh. OH! I was gonna say that you're crazy and there is no bug here, but I wasn't looking close enough at what you actually  posted! You're saying that the rank 1 damage stayed the same (no issues there), but the tooltip for rank 5 damage (200) was correctly updated, while the tooltip for ranks 2/3/4 were NOT updated to the new values! Seems like a valid bug, upvote this post.

However, you should put [GAMEPLAY] in the name of this thread... I think Riot ignores any threads that don't have [GAMEPLAY], [CLIENT], or [CRASH] in their name...
Thank you for your comment. I'd like to edit as you said but I cannot change the title T_T
I sell drugs on the deepweb

Hey hibernis!

Thanks for reporting this! I'll pass it along to the Champion team. ^-^
Upvoting for visibility, good job random Samaritan!
